entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Thursday 16 March 2023
